name: boodo/sync-silvasoft
description: The plugin synchronises the Silvasoft ERP system with the Shopware 6 e-commerce solution. In version 3, syncing is performed via scheduled tasks instead of event-based actions. Manual triggers and logging have also been added.

description.de-DE: Das Plugin synchronisiert das ERP-System von Silvasoft mit der E-Commerce-LÃ¶sung Shopware 6.x
description.nl-NL: De plugin synchroniseert het Silvasoft ERP-systeem met de e-commerceoplossing van Shopware 6.x
description.en-GB: The plugin synchronises the Silvasoft ERP system with the Shopware 6.x e-commerce solution.
